WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS 18 THRU 27 JUL BY
   M/V GEO CARIBBEAN TOWING 12 11200 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-18.18S 039-54.00W, 25-24.00S 039-53.58W,
   25-21.00S 042-10.52W, 24-20.00S 042-09.00W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2178/19.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 28 JUL 19.
